amendment.description: Amendment first reduces then increases funding by $8 million in order to reprogram money within the Veterans Benefits Administration from the Office of General Counsel toward the hiring and training of personnel for reduction of the VA claims backlog.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce then increase funds for the Departmental Administration General Administration in the Department of Veterans Affairs by $8,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
